definition: distant seas/the open ocean (far from the coast)
far/distant/remote/(intensifier in a comparison) by far/much (lower etc)

sentences.english: What is the origin of pelagic oozes ?
sentences.chinese: 远洋软泥的来源是什么？

sentences.english: Small pelagic fish often accompanying sharks or mantas.
sentences.chinese: 经常伴随鲨鱼和蝠鲼游动的远洋小鱼。

sentences.english: An ancient Mediterranean seagoing vessel propelled by oars.
sentences.chinese: 一种古时在地中海内靠桨推进的远洋轮船。

sentences.english: By 1525, the authorities ordered that all oceangoing vessels be destroyed.
sentences.chinese: 1525年，中国下令毁掉所有远洋船只。

sentences.english: The biggest oceangoing ships on the North Atlantic arrived and departed.
sentences.chinese: 那些北大西洋上最大的远洋船到达了，离开了。

sentences.english: Frigates are a vital part of any balanced sea-going fleet.
sentences.chinese: 护卫舰是任何一个配置均衡的远洋舰队所必需的。

sentences.english: Several ocean-going ships are being laid down here.
sentences.chinese: 这里正在建造几艘远洋货轮。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the hearing changes in seamen exposed to oceangoing vessel noise.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析远洋测量船噪声强度对作业人员听力的影响。

sentences.english: Britain´s first seagoing ironclad warship, HMS Warrior, was launched.
sentences.chinese: 英国第一艘远洋装甲战艇“勇士号”下水。

sentences.english: No, the cardboard boxes are not strong enough for ocean transportation.
sentences.chinese: 不行，对远洋运输来说纸箱是不结实的。

sentences.english: There is a bloated body floating in the canal.
sentences.chinese: 许多远洋船只在这条运河上航行。

sentences.english: A large capital ship armed with broadside firing cannons. Capable of travelling across the ocean.
sentences.chinese: 卡拉克战舰侧舷密集排列舷炮，适合远洋航行。

sentences.english: In addition, it attaches great importance to the development of naval and air forces and strengthen our offshore delivery.
sentences.chinese: 另外，它非常注重发展海空军力量，加强远洋投送。

sentences.english: Jake had a share in a large, seagoing vessel.
sentences.chinese: 杰克拥有一艘大型远洋轮的部分所有权。

sentences.english: Loading of the Panamax and larger sized ships will contribute to increased efficiency.
sentences.chinese: 巴拿马型及更大型远洋船舶的装运将促进效率的提高。

sentences.english: Ocean-going vessels can travel through the Xiang to reach Changsha.
sentences.chinese: 远洋船可以穿过项达到长沙。

definition: Tsushima Strait, between Japan and South Korea
the China Seas (the seas of the Western Pacific Ocean, around China: Bohai Sea, Yellow Sea, East China Sea, South China Sea)
to travel a great distance by sea or air/voyage/long-haul flight
to form into columns/to organize into teams/formation (of ships or aircraft)
